author: aandvalenzuela
body:
Hello,

We would like to start keeping track of the changes in the images.
I have added the commit url for the past changes to `el9` in comparison to `el8` (all the changes can be found in the git history). I suggest we try to update the changelog along with the package update. It could be nice to link or explain the update reason in the changelog too.

Thanks,
Andrea
title: Start el8 and el9 changelog
